name: Maze Bandit
description: Build your own dungeon. Defend it with deadly traps. Conquer & loot other mazes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
